title: Longing for belonging
creator_credit: Jane Harrison, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Jane Harrison’s search for belonging is a road trip with a lot of potholes along the way. Of mixed descent, she has longed to connect with her Indigenous heritage, which has forced her to confront some issues and attitudes within Australian society today.
creator_credit_for_label: Jane Harrison, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
